motions.title: Motion to Adjourn
motions.description: Motion to adjourn the special called meeting after first public hearing on 2023 millage rate.

publicHearings.title: Public Hearing for Establishing 2023 Millage Rate
publicHearings.description: First of three required public hearings for establishing 2023 millage rate of 3.040 mills, same as 2022. One speaker opposed (Bob Hickey questioning establishment timing and requesting rollback to 2.74 mills). Second public hearing at 6:00 PM same day, third on July 12, 2023.
publicHearings.recommendation: Staff recommends adoption with revenue increase of $177,000
